CVMServer(8) System Manager's Manual CVMServer(8)

NAME

CVMServer — Mac OS X Core Virtual Machine Server

SYNOPSIS

CVMServer

DESCRIPTION

CVMServer is a system daemon that handles generic task execution in a slave process.

There are no configuration options to CVMServer. Users should not run CVMServer manually.

SEE ALSO

CVMCompiler(8)

HISTORY

The CVMServer daemon first appeared in MacOS X 10.6.

2010-08-26 Mac OS X
